document.title: Hot Topic: Interest Rate Currently 8.75% on Delinquent Taxes Collected or Administered by the State of Tennessee
document.abstract: Finance personnel should make sure the interest rate they use, either in manual calculations or in those generated by computer software, is 8.75 percent for the current fiscal year ending June 30, 2003.
